item.description: KNOCKDOWN Rubbish Fire; INC#0429; 08:51AM; Wb Santa Monica Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LeU0Pj; Downtown; KNOCKDOWN: 83 firefighters extinguished the fire in one hour and 19 minutes with no injuries reported. The large amount of pallets stored under the freeway created a challenge in reaching the seat of the fire. Forklifts on scene were used to move the extinguished pallets so firefighters could continue to make their way in and fully extinguished the fire. CHP will handle the re-opening of the freeway, drivers are advised to check https://cad.chp.ca.gov/Traffic.aspx for updates. LAFD Arson is responding for a *possible* witness to the fire cause. No further details.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 CM22 E1 E14 E15 E17 E2 E201 E202 E203 E210 E211 E221 E25 E4 E9 EA1 EM1 RA17 RA25 T1 T10 T11 T2 T21 T3 T9; CH7; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Trapped Vehicle - FATALITY; INC#0460; 08:28AM; Eb 105 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rNbFWP; outside city; Three car collision (into Cal Trans truck) with one person determined deceased on scene (age/gender unknown at this time). There are no other injuries reported. All media queries regarding the collision are referred to CHP (incident number not available). The 9-1-1 call was received at 8:06AM. No further details.; FS 51; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District outside city; BC4 E205 E295 E51 E64 E67 EM9 HR3 RA51 RA95 T5 T95 UR88; CH7; 15; Margaret Stewart

Update Rubbish Fire; INC#0429; 08:14AM; Wb Santa Monica Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LeU0Pj; Downtown; With pallets stacked all the way from the ground to the freeway, there is a significant amount of fuel to burn. Firefighters made access to both sides of the freeway to use large diameter handlines/appliances. The amount of smoke created is causing a zero-visibility environment as firefighters continue to work their way in and make progress. The 10FWY remains closed and drivers are advised to plan alternate routes. There are now 83 firefighters assigned to this incident. The freeway itself is the primary exposure with some commercial buildings threatened but not currently exposed. No injuries reported. ; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 CM22 E1 E14 E15 E17 E2 E201 E202 E203 E210 E211 E221 E25 E4 E9 EA1 EM1 RA17 T1 T10 T11 T2 T21 T3 T9; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Rubbish Fire; INC#0429; 07:32AM; Wb Santa Monica Fy x Lawrence St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LeU0Pj; Downtown; A large amount of pallets and rubbish burning under the freeway is creating significant smoke which will impact driver safety, therefore the CHP is shutting down the 10 Freeway in both directions until it is safe to re-open. Drivers are advised to plan alternate routes. Additional resources were requested to aid in accessing the area from both sides. No injuries reported. The 9-1-1 call was received at 7:32AM. LAPD Inc# 1204 CHP Log# 0851; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E17 E25 E4 E9; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue; INC#0937; 03:31PM; 4358 Griffith Park Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3k8IMAa; Griffith Park; Firefighters located a 76yo M (reported to have fallen off a bicycle) in grave condition. Griffith Park Rangers were on scene, prior to LAFD, providing immediate medical care. The patient is being transferred to LAFD Firefighter/Paramedics who are providing advanced life-saving care and bringing him to the awaiting LAFD Air Ambulance for rapid transport. The 9-1-1 call was received at 3:08PM ; FS 56; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E235 E35 H1 H5 HA1 HA5 RA76 RA835 RH114 T35; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0601; 11:44AM; 1466 N Fries Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xP6I3B; Wilmington; KNOCKDOWN: 31 firefighters extinguished the fire in 16 minutes with no injuries reported. They contained the fire to one room in the home. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC6 E238 E248 E36 E49 E64 RA36 RA38 T38 T48; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0601; 11:28AM; 1466 N Fries Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xP6I3B; Wilmington; One story, single family dwelling with fire showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC6 E238 E248 E36 E49 E64 RA36 RA38 T38 T48; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1501; 08:55PM; 15017 W Ventura Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Kcbg6q; Sherman Oaks; KNOCKDOWN: 56 firefighters extinguished the fire in 23 minutes with no injuries reported. The structure is a one story, vacant restaurant . The bulk of the fire was towards the rear (unknown name of occupancy). The exposed buildings to the north (Charlie side) and East (Bravo) of the building were defended from any extension. The cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 BC14 BC9 CM42 E239 E260 E273 E293 E39 E83 E88 E99 EA1 EM14 EM17 RA39 RA78 RA83 RA99 T39 T60 T93; CH9; 18; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1501; 08:32PM; 15000 W Ventura Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3K7qQBB; Sherman Oaks; One row of small commercial units with fire showing. Additional resources requested. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 BC14 E239 E293 E39 E83 E99 RA83 RA99 T39 T93; CH9; 18; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue; INC#1443; 08:22PM; 6800 N Valley Circle Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MoHfBV; West Hills; LAFD Air Operations located the injured hiker, approximately 25yo M with significant traumatic injuries sustained in an approx 100' fall. A hoist operation is underway and the patient will be transported in critical condition. Ventura County Fire Department is also on scene with a full hiker response. The 9-1-1 call was received at 7:55PM. No further details.; FS 105; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC17 E288 E305 E73 E88 H0E H1 H2 HA1 HA2 RA106 RA88 RH114 T105 T88 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart
